trans-unit.source: Specifies a portion of the list view item from which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Angir en del av visningen listeelementet skal hentes det avgrensende rektangelet fra.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk medlemmene i denne opplisting når du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is also used when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne nummerering brukes også når du kaller en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A>metode for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle of the entire item, including the icon, the item text, and the subitem text (if displayed), should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet for hele elementet, inkludert ikonet, Elementtekst og subitem teksten (hvis vist), må hentes.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet for vises eller lavt ikonet skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle of the icon or small icon and the item text should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet for ikonet eller lite ikon og elementteksten som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: In all views except the details view of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>, this value specifies the same bounding rectangle as the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: I alle visninger unntatt vise detaljene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>, denne verdien angir det samme avgrensende rektangelet som den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: In details view, this value specifies the bounding rectangle specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value without the subitems.
trans-unit.target: I detaljvisningen, denne verdien angir det avgrensende rektangelet som er angitt av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""> </xref> verdi uten underelementene.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, this property does not include the area of the check boxes in its bounding rectangle. To include the entire item, including the check boxes, use the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""></xref> value when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.GetItemRect*> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <> </> *> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, egenskapen inkluderer ikke området avmerkingsboksene i det avgrensende rektangelet. Hvis du vil inkludere hele elementet, inkludert disse alternativene, kan du bruke den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Entire" name="Entire" href=""> </xref> verdi ved kall av <> </> *> metoden.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle of the item text should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet for elementteksten skal hentes.
